page.description: Fires when a row is checked or unchecked in a List configured to display a checkbox selector column.

argument.name: e
argument.description: An object with the following properties:

property.name: checked
property.description: Whether or not the row has been checked (false if unchecked)

property.name: renderIndex
property.description: The row number where the checked row appears in the list.

property.name: value
property.description: The row value -- this is the value returned by the list when the row is selected.

discussion.p: The *[js:onRowCheck]* event fires when a list row is checked or unchecked. This includes clicking the check all/uncheck all toggle for the List control. The event will fire once for each row.
